component.name: barcode_split
component.doc: FASTX Toolkit, barcode splitter in barcode_split.pl (adapted by Alex Kanitz) This program splits a FASTQ/FASTA file into several smaller files, based on barcode matching

input.name: infolder
input.doc: fastq file in its own folder, output from previous anduril component fastq-dump

output.name: outfolder
output.doc: fastq files split depending on barcode, all files in one folder, barcodes removed

parameter.name: mismatches
parameter.doc: number of allowed mismatches, default set in perl script to 30%

parameter.name: eol
parameter.doc: if 5_END, barcodes should be checked for at 5'-end of read, if 3_END, barcodes 3'
